item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）季度快报显示美国银行全面增长
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.【原文：Net income at US banks rose more than 13% in the third quarter as money in the bedrock deposit insurance fund ticked higher and the number of problem banks went down, according to the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.】

item.title: 亚马逊卫星互联网服务开始面向企业预览
item.description: 亚马逊利奥（Amazon Leo）是最近重新命名的卫星互联网系统，旨在与太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的星链（Starlink）系统相抗衡。【原文：Amazon Leo, the recently rebranded satellite-internet system meant to rival SpaceX’s Starlink, has begun previewing its service for a select group of customers, ahead of a wider public rollout planned for next year.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德称拥抱人工智能仍能为欧洲带来优势
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德说，欧洲经济应拥抱人工智能，消除任何可能减缓其推广速度的障碍，以免错失该技术带来的好处。【原文：Europe’s economy should embrace artificial intelligence and remove any hurdles that could slow its diffusion to avoid missing out on the technology’s benefits, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said.】

item.title: 韩元在议息前逼近美元抛售触发区
item.description: 韩元跌至 4 月以来最弱，接近人们密切关注的水平，因为在央行本周做出政策决定之前，本地基金增加海外投资给韩元带来了压力。【原文：The Korean won fell to its weakest since April, approaching a closely watched level as increased overseas investments by local funds put pressure on the currency ahead of the central bank’s policy decision this week.】

item.title: 工会称西班牙电信计划裁员 5000 人以降低成本
item.description: 西班牙最大的电信运营商西班牙电信公司（Telefonica SA）旨在裁减至少 5040 个工作岗位，作为削减成本的全面计划的一部分。【原文：Spain’s largest telecommunications operator Telefonica SA aims to cut at least 5,040 jobs as part of a sweeping plan to slash costs, the top union representing its workers said.】

item.title: 卢特尼克称特朗普正在权衡向中国销售先进的英伟达芯片事宜
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统正在权衡是否允许英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）向中国出售先进的人工智能芯片，并将就此事做出最终决定。【原文：President Donald Trump is weighing whether to allow Nvidia Corp. to sell advanced artificial intelligence chips to China and will be the one to make a final decision on the matter, US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said.】

item.title: 瑞银集团罗曼诺称美股轮动可能已经结束
item.description: 瑞银证券（UBS Securities）的交易员表示，美股的大跌可能已经结束，为年底的反弹奠定了基础。【原文：The selloff in US stocks may have run its course, setting the stage for a year-end rally, according to UBS Securities’ trading desk.】

item.title: 以色列近两年来首次降低利率
item.description: 以色列周一降低了利率，这是近两年来的第一次，决策者们鼓励加沙停火将有助于控制通胀风险。【原文：Israel lowered interest rates on Monday for the first time in almost two years, with policymakers encouraged a ceasefire in Gaza will help keep risks to inflation under control.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称巨额预算危及波兰经济轨迹
item.description: 国际货币基金组织呼吁波兰进行 "果断的改革"，以解决其宽松的财政政策和结构性障碍，这些问题威胁着波兰与世界最发达经济体接轨的能力。【原文：The International Monetary Fund called for “decisive reforms” to fix Poland’s lax fiscal policy and structural obstacles that threaten the country’s ability to converge with the world’s most-developed economies.】

item.title: 亿万富翁为旧金山的复兴提供资金支持，一次一个派对
item.description: 犯罪监控、食品援助、一棵 83 英尺高的圣诞树--这些都是由旧金山亿万富翁组成的一个影响力越来越大的联盟支付的。【原文：Crime surveillance, food assistance, an 83-foot Christmas tree – they’re all being paid for by an increasingly influential coalition of San Francisco billionaires.】

item.title: 据说先正达在上海撤资后将考虑在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，先正达集团正在考虑在香港进行首次公开募股，而在此之前一年多，该公司曾撤回了在上海上市的计划，计划募资 90 亿美元。【原文：Syngenta Group is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter, more than a year after it withdrew a plan for a $9 billion listing in Shanghai.】

item.title: 捷克大选获胜者预算缺口达 45 亿美元
item.description: 准备组建下一届捷克政府的三个政党拒绝了即将卸任的政府的明年预算草案，称该计划缺乏对关键支出领域的资助。【原文：The three parties preparing to form the next Czech government rejected the outgoing administration’s draft budget for next year, saying the plan lacked financing for key spending areas.】

item.title: 阿斯达因售后回租交易和价格战而陷入困境
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将英国大型连锁超市阿斯达（Asda）的评级下调至垃圾级，部分原因是阿斯达最近签署了售后回租交易，其中包括与美国资产管理公司蓝猫头鹰资本（Blue Owl Capital）的交易。【原文：UK value supermarket chain Asda was downgraded deeper into junk by Fitch Ratings, in part due to recently signed sale-and-leaseback transactions — including one with US asset manager Blue Owl Capital.】

item.title: 必和必拓的新盎格鲁项目聚焦铜矿增长计划
item.description: 在此之前，这家矿业巨头一直坚持认为，自己的业务将为其带来所需的影响力。【原文：Until now, the mining giant had been insisting its own operations would give it the heft it needed.】

item.title: 世界银行因利率降低而上调肯尼亚经济增长预测
item.description: 世界银行上调了对肯尼亚经济增长的预测，称低通胀、宽松的货币政策、更强劲的信贷增长和富有活力的农业是上调预测的主要原因。【原文：The World Bank raised its growth forecast for Kenya, citing low inflation, easier monetary policy, stronger credit growth and resilient agriculture as key drivers behind the revision.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒呼吁 12 月减息，然后逐次召开会议
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，他主张在 12 月份降息，不过，从 1 月份开始，一旦收到大量经济数据，美国央行可能会更多地采取逐次会议的方式。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said he’s advocating an interest-rate cut in December, though the US central bank can probably take more of a meeting-by-meeting approach starting in January once it receives a flood of economic data.】

item.title: X-Energy 为先进核反应堆设计融资 7 亿美元
item.description: 由亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）支持的先进核技术公司 X-Energy LLC 从简街集团（Jane Street Group）领导的投资者那里筹集了约 7 亿美元，用于将其小型反应堆商业化。【原文：X-Energy LLC, an advanced nuclear technology company backed by Amazon.com Inc., raised some $700 million from investors led by Jane Street Group to commercialize its small reactor.】

item.title: 印度最高法院在达成和解后撤销对桑德萨拉斯的起诉
item.description: 印度最高法院同意撤销对尼廷-桑德萨拉（Nitin Sandesara）和切坦-桑德萨拉（Chetan Sandesara）兄弟的所有刑事指控，这对兄弟曾创建了尼日利亚领先的石油公司之一，在银行欺诈案中同意一次性赔偿 510 亿卢比（5.72 亿美元）。【原文：India’s Supreme Court has agreed to quash all criminal charges against Nitin and Chetan Sandesara, brothers who built one of Nigeria’s leading oil companies, after agreeing to a one-time settlement of 51 billion rupees ($572 million) in a bank fraud case.】

item.title: 巴西经济学家下调 2026 年关键利率预测，因通胀放缓
item.description: 巴西经济学家自 9 月份以来首次下调了 2026 年年末利率预测，原因是通胀率逐步回落，巴西央行坚持其鹰派货币政策立场。【原文：Brazil economists cut their 2026 year-end interest rate forecasts for the first time since September as inflation gradually comes down and the central bank sticks to its hawkish stance on monetary policy.】

item.title: KKR 的 Raj Agrawal 警告人工智能投资热潮中的泡沫
item.description: KKR & Co.的拉吉-阿格拉瓦（Raj Agrawal）说，他也对数据中心和人工智能的过度繁荣表示担忧，公司正在有选择性地降低风险。【原文：KKR & Co.’s Raj Agrawal said he’s among those concerned about excess exuberance in data centers and artificial intelligence and that the firm is being selective to mitigate risk.】

item.title: 墨西哥本月初通胀加速超过预期
item.description: 在墨西哥央行重申对物价持续上涨的担忧之后，墨西哥 11 月初的年度通胀加速度超过了预期。【原文：Mexico’s annual inflation accelerated more than expected in early November after the central bank reiterated concerns of persistent price increases.】

item.title: 谷歌在最新双子座更新中让人工智能构建用户界面
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔（Austin Carr）将探讨谷歌决定将界面设计外包给其不断发展的双子座工具。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Austin Carr looks at Google’s decision to outsource interface design to its ever-evolving Gemini tools.】

item.title: 人工智能产业建立在一个未经证实的重大假设之上
item.description:
除了预测人工智能将达到通用水平并取代数以百万计的人类工作者之外，我们还考虑到了人工智能芯片的寿命问题。【原文：

In addition to the projections about reaching artificial general intelligence and replacing millions of human workers, there’s the mundane matter of how long AI chips will last.

】

item.title: 美联储尚未准备好效仿格林斯潘押注科技繁荣
item.description: 全球经济正盲目飞向人工智能革命。【原文：The global economy is flying blind into the AI revolution.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税为何阻碍了美国工厂的就业
item.description: 特朗普仍对推动美国工厂复兴所需的外国制造机器征收关税【原文：Trump still has tariffs on foreign-made machines needed to fuel a US factory revival】

item.title: Blackstone 支持的 Beacon Offshore 通过新油井在美国海湾下注
item.description: Beacon Offshore Energy LLC 是一家由 Blackstone Inc. 支持的石油勘探公司，该公司将赌注押在墨西哥湾的钻井复兴上，因为它将利用新技术启动美国一些产量最高的油井，以抽取曾经无法到达的原油。【原文：Beacon Offshore Energy LLC, an oil explorer backed by Blackstone Inc., is betting on a drilling renaissance in the Gulf of Mexico as it starts up some of the most productive wells in the US using new technology to pump once-impossible-to-reach crude.】

item.title: 即使以加密货币的标准来看，比特币的暴跌也是残酷的
item.description:
对于比特币死忠来说，命运的逆转已经不是什么新鲜事了。但这次不同。【原文：

Reversals of fortune are nothing new for Bitcoin diehards. But this time is different.

】

item.title: 印度央行行长称存在降息空间后印度债券上涨
item.description: 印度储备银行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）表示，最新数据表明存在降息空间，印度债券涨幅扩大。【原文：Indian bonds extended gains after the Reserve Bank of India Governor Sanjay Malhotra said the latest data suggests there’s scope for an interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 汇丰银行认为埃及镑在贬值后将赢得投资者信任
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holding Plc）首席地区经济学家表示，埃及镑正在赢得外国债务投资者的信任，如果埃及进一步降息，这些投资者可能不会望而却步。【原文：Egypt’s pound is gaining the trust of foreign debt-investors who likely won’t be deterred if the nation makes deeper interest-rate cuts, according to HSBC Holding Plc’s chief regional economist.】

item.title: 大科技公司的人工智能债务浪潮有可能淹没信贷市场
item.description: 大科技公司大量抛售债务有可能使买家不堪重负，并可能削弱大西洋两岸的信贷市场。【原文：A flood of debt sales from Big Tech risks overwhelming buyers and could weaken the credit market on both sides of the Atlantic.】
